channel.title: Additional material on Orange Academy
channel.description: Recent content in Additional material on Orange Academy

item.title: CSS Grid Expanded
item.description: CSS Grid Layout CSS Grid Layout (aka Grid), is a two-dimensional grid-based layout system that aims to do nothing less than completely change the way we design grid-based user interfaces.

item.title: CSS Grid Items Expanded
item.description: This is a continuation lesson with the CSS Grid Container lesson float, display: inline-block, display: table-cell, vertical-align and column-* properties have no effect on a grid item.
